text: Robot Chicken is an American sketch comedy adult stop-motion animated television series and sitcom. It is shown on a part of Cartoon Network called Adult Swim. It was created by Seth Green and Matthew Senreich. == References == Category:2005 American television series debuts Category:2000s American comedy television series Category:2000s satirical television series Category:2010s American comedy television series Category:2010s satirical television series Category:Adult Swim Category:American animated television series Category:American satirical television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Robot Chicken
